import numpy as np import h5py
f = h5py.File('particle_attributes.particles.PosMeasure.h5part', 'r') d = f['/Step#{}'.format(len(f)-1)] idx = np.argsort(d['id']) att_1 = d['ScalPos1'][:] pos = d['x'][:] + d['y'][:] scal_error = np.sqrt((att_1 - pos)**2) scalar_error_1=abs(scal_error).max()
print ("max error",scalar_error_1)
